actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to remove the needs provision for families with income with less than $15,000 a year from the student loan subsidy provision of that act.

summary.text: Removes, under the Higher Education Act, the needs provision for families with income less than $15,000 a year from the student loan subsidy provision of such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to remove the needs provision for families with income with less than $15,000 a year from the student loan subsidy provision of that act.
